name: Michelle Biloon
bio:
Michelle Biloon is is a standup comic straight outta Philly by way of Los Angeles by way of Austin. You may have heard her on the popular podcasts Comedy Bang Bang, 2 Dope Queens, or Doug Loves Movies. You may have seen her perform standup in your city opening for Patton Oswalt or headlining a show her down damn self (in a much much much smaller venue). She's also appeared on Chelsea Lately, The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, Comics Unleashed, Comedy.tv, and Premium Blend.

Want to know more about Michelle? She loves Judge Judy. She does the New York Times Crossword Puzzle every day. And she is motherfucking hilarious.

Her mother has been quoted as saying, "I watched the tape of her before I left for bowling and I laughed so hard that I had to go redo my makeup." And that's the truth, jackasses.
